items.title: First Tick: Top 10 global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is indicating a flat to negative start for the day

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a negative start; US, Asian markets fall
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's three major indexes closed lower on Tuesday as investors booked some profits from a post-election rally and waited anxiously for U.S. inflation data due this week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 382.15 points, or 0.86%, to 43,910.98, the S&P 500 lost 17.36 points, or 0.29%, to 5,983.99 and the Nasdaq Composite lost 17.36 points, or 0.09%, to 19,281.40.

items.title: Stock Radar: Nykaa, BSE, PNB Housing Finance, Swiggy, ACME Solar, EMS, Ashoka Buidcon in focus on Wednesday
items.description: Stocks like Bosch, MedPlus Health Services, PNC Infratech, Sula Vineyards, Gujarat State Fertilizers & Chemicals, DCX Systems, PTC India, Repco Home Finance, and Varun Beverages will also be in focus on November 13.

items.title: Trent Limited| Multiple growth triggers to maintain industry leading growth momentum
items.description: Trent Limited is flagship fashion retail company of the Tata Group. Trent is fast scaling up its key fashion apparel brands viz Westside and Zudio. Apart from apparel Trent has been scaling up in new categories viz footwear and innerwear. Setting up of dedicated mass beauty stores and foray into lab grown diamonds would provide the next growth leg.

items.title: Brokerage Radar: CLSA upgrades Samvardhana Motherson, Macquarie initiates coverage on power stocks
items.description: Check out the latest brokerage calls and analyst comments on the stocks in action today. Our coverage includes Samvardhana Motherson, RIL, Hyundai Motor and more.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a negative start; US, Asian markets fall
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's three major indexes closed lower on Tuesday as investors booked some profits from a post-election rally and waited anxiously for U.S. inflation data due this week. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 382.15 points, or 0.86%, to 43,910.98, the S&P 500 lost 17.36 points, or 0.29%, to 5,983.99 and the Nasdaq Composite lost 17.36 points, or 0.09%, to 19,281.40.

items.title: Buy Sansera Engineering; target of Rs 1676: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on Sansera Engineering has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1676 in its research report dated November 12, 2024.

items.title: Live: Nifty Braces For Another 200-Point Selloff Below 23,800; Muted Debut For Swiggy? |Opening Bell
items.description: Nifty saw a 400 point reversal intraday yesterday to shut shop below the 23,900 level. All sectors ended in the red with PSUs, autos and metals leading the declines. Amid mixed global cues, the Indian indices opened higher with Nifty above 24,200 but erased all the gains in the initial hours and traded flat in the first half. However, increased profit booking dragged the Nifty index below 23,900 to close near day's low. Biggest losers on the Nifty were Britannia Industries, HDFC Bank, NTPC, Asian Paints and Bharat Electronics, while gainers included Trent, HCL Technologies, Sun Pharma, Infosys and Reliance Industries. Today the focus will be on the Nifty bank index as it will have its last weekly expiry. Among stocks, watch out for BSE, Nykaa and Eicher Motors among others. Swiggy is likely to make a subdued debut on Dalal Street. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Rajesh Palviya, Senior Vice President Research (Head Technical & Derivatives ) at Axis Securities and Rishi Kohli, CIO - Hedge Fund Strategies, InCred Alternative Investments

items.title: Buy Mrs.Bector Foods Specialties; target of Rs 2000: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on Mrs.Bector Foods Specialties has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 2000 in its research report dated November 12, 2024.

items.title: BSE stock rises on strong Q2 earnings, but Jefferies sticks to ‘Underperform’
items.description: Leading stock exchange BSE reported a three-time surge in net profit to Rs 346 crore for the September quarter. The bourse's total revenues increased over two-fold to Rs 819 crore.

items.title: FIIs press the brakes on IPOs after selling shares worth nearly $3 bn in November
items.description: In the current month till date, four IPOs — Swiggy, Sagility India, ACME Solar Holdings, and Niva Bupa Health Insurance — have collectively raised around Rs 18,534 crore. FIIs, however, have contributed only Rs 2,900 crore by way of bids, as per NSDL data.

items.title: Medplus Health shares surge 7% after net profit doubles in Q2
items.description: MedPlus Health also recently announced plans to expand into tier-2 cities by opening 600 new stores over the next three years.

items.title: Nykaa stock jumps 5% on robust Q2 earnings; Nuvama remains bullish but cuts target
items.description: Nykaa sees a diversified channel mix for its beauty-owned brands as it drives down on omnichannel presence and alternative platforms for select categories to enhance customer experience.

items.title: KNR Constructions soars 14% on stellar Q2FY25 results
items.description: The company's net profit jumped by a whopping 310 percent year-on-year (YoY) or four-fold to Rs 585 crore in Q2FY25

items.title: TBO Tek: Faster Q2 growth through better product mix
items.description: Surging travel & tourism despite consumption slowdown fuels TBO Tek's impressive growth momentum

items.title: Nifty, Sensex slide to three-month lows as auto, metal stocks fall; Inflation highest in 14 months
items.description: The slide marks the fifth consecutive losing session for both indices, driven by the latest inflation report that showed prices climbing to a 14-month high of 6.21 percent, breaching the Reserve Bank of India's upper tolerance limit.

items.title: Ashoka Buildcon surges 8% as net profit jumps four-fold YoY in Q2FY25
items.description: The highway developer reported four-fold year-on-year (YoY) jump in net profit to Rs 462 crore in Q2FY2

items.title: PNB Housing Fin stock dives 7% after Quality Investment Holdings likely sells stake in Rs 2,300 cr block deal
items.description: PNB Housing Finance Block Deal: As per reports, the block deal would also trigger a 60-day lock in period until Quality Investment Holdings can offload further shares.

items.title: Zomato stock slips 2.5% after Macquarie flags downside risks
items.description: Macquarie raised its target price for Zomato to Rs 130, although the new target still suggests a potential downside of 50 percent from the previous closing level.

items.title: Britannia Industries: Healthy volume momentum is on amid soft demand
items.description: Enhanced execution and balanced price actions are key to steady growth and margins.

items.title: EPack Durable shares slide 5% as Q2 net loss widens on year
items.description: Operating EBITDA for the September quarter increased by 25 percent YoY to Rs 9.6 crore. EBITDA margins, however, contracted by 177 basis points to 2.55 percent.
